content: same time on every 5th round change hook size to 1mm larger beginning with round 5 round 5 = 9mm hook round 10 = 10mm hook round 15 = 11mm hook skirt as shown is 15 rounds long and ended on a round-3 pattern feel free to add more if you like edging round 1 with size 11mm hook and thick yarn a chain 1 working only in the chain spaces work single_crochet around placing 5 single_crochet sts in each chain-4 space and 4 single_crochet sts in each chain-3 space skip all single_crochet stitches from the previous row slip_stitch into first single_crochet to join round 2 chain 1 working in front loops only single_crochet in each of first 2 sts single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet picot made * single_crochet in each of next 8 sts make picot in next st ** single_crochet in each of next 4 sts make picot in next st* repeat around ending the last repeat at ** and two sts remaining single_crochet in each of the last 2 sts and slip_stitch into first single_crochet to close tie off yarn and weave in end round 3 change to f hook and join kid silk haze b work 1 single_crochet into the back loop of the single_crochet below continuing in the back loops only work * chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet * around pass behind picots skipping the chain stitches and working in the backs of each single_crochet chain 5 and slip_stitch into first single_crochet to join round 4 slip_stitch up first 3 chains to begin at the middle of the chain-5 space single_crochet in chain-5 space *in next chain-5 space work 1tr chain 2 4 times treble_crochet once more in same space ** single_crochet in next chain-5 space * repeat around ending last repeat at ** slip_stitch into first single_crochet to join tie off and weave in ends round 5 with size 11 5mm hook join yarn a to remaining back loops of round 2 chain 4 counts as a double_crochet plus 1 chain * skip one single_crochet and double_crochet into next single_crochet chain 1 * repeat * to * around skip last stitch and slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning chain 4 to join repeat round 5 twice more tie off and weave in ends finishing weave ribbon or other belt through the button holes i used a thin knit belt from an old sweater finish ribbon ends by clipping them in a v shape so they won t fray i didn t block this skirt but if you want to go right ahead you can wear a slip or an a-line flared bias cut or pencil skirt underneath easily but please experiment with other shapes and let me know how it goes even howard is a vagabond crocheter who loves creating ways for others to experiment local yarns crochet stitch structures and their uses and snow in spring are among her favorite things if you like this pattern please donate to even
